name: Panther Hunting: Sniper Surviv
description:
Panther Hunting: Sniper Survival is Africa jungle safari adventure for real hunters where you have to hunt wild panthers, black tigers and leopards. Go on in North America jungle to find and shoot the wild hunting animals. To Kill all the panther with sniper . You have to hunt animals for your survival in wild jungle. This new panther hunting game is a hunting animals fury where American hunting is going on just like forest hunting. In endless hunting mode, grab your sniper to shoot the various animals like deer, rhinoceroses, lions, buffalos, zebras and many other animals on the African continent. Your goal is to kill all panthers in your sniper range.
Features:
- You can enjoy this hunting game offline
- Realistic animation of fighting animals
- New hunting games
- Wild Africa Safari Animal Hunting Simulation
- Slow motion bullet effects
- Diverse animal life for best hunters.
